SEARCH
Module gamecritic
Package utils

Class DataBaseUtil

java.lang.Object
utils.DataBaseUtil
public class DataBaseUtil extends Object
Utility class for managing all database interactions within the application. This class contains methods to handle database operations for users, games, and reviews, as well as specific utility functions for managing game awards and critics balances.

    • addUser

      public static void addUser(String username, String password, String userType) throws SQLException
      Adds new user to the database.
      Parameters:
      username - users username
      password - users password
      userType - type of user (User, Critic, Administrator)
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs

      Parameters:
      username - username of user to verify
      Returns:
      user object containing the users data
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs

    • updateUsername

      public static boolean updateUsername(int userId, String newUsername) throws SQLException
      Updates users username in the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - id of user whose username is to be updated
      newUsername - new username to update
      Returns:
      true if update was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs

      public static boolean updateBalance(int userId, double newBalance) throws SQLException
      Updates balance in the database, if user is Critic
      Parameters:
      userId - id of user whose balance is to be updated
      newBalance - new balance to update
      Returns:
      true if update was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:

    • addGame

      public static boolean addGame(String title, String developer, String releaseDate, String platforms, String genre, String storeLink, String description, String imagePath) throws SQLException
      Adds new game to the database.
      Parameters:
      title - title of game
      developer - developer of game
      releaseDate - release date of game
      platforms - platforms on which game is available
      genre - genre of game
      storeLink - link to store where game can be purchased
      description - description of game
      imagePath - path to cover image of game
      Returns:
      true if game was successfully added, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs

    • getGames

      public static List<Game> getGames(int number, String attribute) throws SQLException
      Retrieves list of games from the database based on specified sorting attribute and limited by number.
      Parameters:
      number - maximum number of games to retrieve
      attribute - attribute by which games need to be sorted (e.g. release_date)
      Returns:
      list of game objects
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs

    • getGames

      public static List<Game> getGames(String year, String attribute) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of games from the database for a specified year, ordered by specified attribute.
      Parameters:
      year - year for which games are being queried
      attribute - attribute by which games need to be sorted (e.g. release_date)
      Returns:
      list of game objects
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs

      Parameters:

    • getReview

      public static Review getReview(int userId, int gameId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a review for specified game and user from the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - user id for whom review is being fetched
      gameId - game id for which review is being fetched
      Returns:
      review object, either basic Review or DetailedReview if user is Critic
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs

    • addReview

      public static void addReview(int gameId, int userId, int score, String reviewText, String publishDate, String pluses, String minuses) throws SQLException
      Adds or updates review in the database. It updates the review if there is existing entry for the same user and game.
      Parameters:
      gameId - id of game being reviewed
      userId - id of user writing review
      score - score given in review
      reviewText - text of review
      publishDate - date when review is published
      pluses - positive aspects of game (only for DetailedReview)
      minuses - negative aspects of game (DetailedReview)
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs

    • getDetailedReviews

      public static List<DetailedReview> getDetailedReviews(int gameId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves list of detailed reviews for specified game id.
      Parameters:
      gameId - game id for which detailed reviews are to be fetched
      Returns:
      list of detailed review objects
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs

    • getReviews

      public static List<Review> getReviews(int gameId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves list of reviews for specified game id.
      Parameters:
      gameId - game id for which reviews are to be fetched
      Returns:
      list of review objects
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs

    • uploadGameAwardsByYear

      public static void uploadGameAwardsByYear(String year) throws SQLException
      Awards best games of specified year based on their genre. Method updates games awards status to true for those that rank highest in their genre based on average score for given year.
      Parameters:
      year - year for which awards are to be calculated and assigned
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs

    • getYears

      public static List<String> getYears() throws SQLException
      Retrieves list of years for which games have been awarded. This method is used for displaying historical awards data.
      Returns:
      list of years when games have received awards
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs
